meanings.definition: To soak food in a seasoned liquid before cooking.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy marinading chicken in lemon juice and herbs.
meanings.sent2: She is marinading the steak in a delicious marinade.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled the marinade while marinading the meat.
meanings.sent4: The flavors were marinading together, creating a mouthwatering dish.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the marinading meat filled the kitchen with anticipation.

meanings.sent1: Marinading enhances the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent2: The marinading process requires patience and time.
meanings.sent3: The marinading of the vegetables made them more flavorful.
meanings.sent4: The long marinading time resulted in a tender and flavorful meal.
meanings.sent5: The marinading of the meat was crucial for a delicious outcome.
